\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\* debug.t This module forms part of the adv3Lite library, and defines a number of commands that can be used for debugging purposes. \(c\) 2012-13 Eric Eve (but based partly on code borrowed from the Mercury library (c) Michael J. Roberts).

symToVal (val)

debug.t[277]

Take a string and return the object whose programmatic name it refers to

valToSym (val)

debug.t[283]
